planSelection.footerNote: All plans are billed monthly or annually. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time from your account settings.

description.1: Get up and running fast with essential order & inventory tools.

0.name: CrumbData - Starter Essentials
0.whyThisPlan: Lightweight, powerful, and cost-effective—Starter Essentials gives independent bakers core tools to manage orders, track key ingredients, and see basic usage trends. Ideal if you’re just starting or run a very small operation.

description.0: For growing businesses ready to scale.
description.1: All-in-one order management + deep insights to optimize and grow.

1.name: CrumbData - Growth Accelerator
1.whyThisPlan: You’re beyond the basics—now you need real data to plan purchases, optimize recipes, orders, and spot sales trends. Growth Accelerator brings forecasting, polished reports, and faster support so you bake bigger profits and expand efficiently.

description.0: For established bakeries that demand excellence.
description.1: Full-featured, white-glove service, and limitless scalability.

2.name: CrumbData - Premium Pro Suite
2.whyThisPlan: If you’re running multiple sites, handling high order volume, or need bespoke workflows—Premium Pro Suite is your all-inclusive suite, complete with real-time SLAs, hands-on training, and a dedicated team that evolves the app around your unique needs.

planSelection.subtitle: You're one step away! Choose the plan that aligns with your ambition and let's start baking success together.
planSelection.title: Unlock Your Potential
